Pre-Game Insights: The LA Lakers are under a new coach, JJ Redick, who is implementing a new system focused on three-point shooting and structured play.
The Minnesota Timberwolves have made a major roster change by trading Karl-Anthony Towns, and they will not have Anthony Edwards or Julius Randle in the preseason opener.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the opening night of the 2024 NBA preseason.
The starting lineups for both teams may change close to the game.
Others: The Timberwolves are favored with a money line of -155 and a spread of -3.5.
The Lakers are underdogs with a money line of +130.
